images.summary: This section view shows a thickened edge detail of a foundation. The detail includes (2) 15M continuous rebar as reinforcement, with a note to see additional notes for cover specifications. The foundation sits on compacted granular fill 'A' and bedrock. The section is labeled as 3/S1, indicating its reference on sheet S1. The dimensions include a minimum thickness of 6 inches, a 1-foot width, and an 11-inch height for the thickened edge. The drawing scale is 1/2"=1'-0".

images.summary: This section illustrates a slab-on-grade foundation with specific construction details. It includes (2) 15M continuous rebar for reinforcement, with compacted granular fill 'A' beneath the slab and bedrock as the base layer. A foam construction gasket is provided between new and existing concrete. The section also details a pier pinned to bedrock with (4) 12-inch long 15M rebar dowels. The slope grade is specified to be away at 2%. The joint between rock and concrete slab is to be grouted with waterproof hydraulic cement. The bedrock surface must be cleaned and roughened, with a bonding agent applied. The drawing scale is 1/2"=1'-0".

images.summary: This plan view shows the layout of a slab-on-grade foundation. The slab is constructed with 5 1/2 inches of 32MPa poured concrete, reinforced with either 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh (WWM), a 16" x 16" 10M rebar grid, or fiber mesh, all on a minimum of 6 inches of compacted granular fill 'A'. Foam construction gaskets are specified where the new slab abuts existing foundations and around each sonotube. Concrete piers, 16" x 16", are pinned to bedrock with (4) 12-inch long 15M rebar dowels with a minimum 6-inch embedment. The joint between concrete and bedrock is to be grouted with waterproof hydraulic cement. The plan includes dimensions of 36'-0" by 17'-0" with various internal dimensions. The drawing scale is 1/8"=1'-0".

images.summary: This image combines a plan view of a slab-on-grade foundation with a section detail. The slab is constructed with 5 1/2 inches of 32MPa poured concrete, reinforced with either 6x6x6/6 welded wire mesh (WWM), a 16" x 16" 10M rebar grid, or fiber mesh, all on a minimum of 6 inches of compacted granular fill 'A'. Foam construction gaskets are specified where the new slab abuts existing foundations and around each sonotube. Concrete piers, 16" x 16", are pinned to bedrock with (4) 12-inch long 15M rebar dowels with a minimum 6-inch embedment. The joint between concrete and bedrock is to be grouted with waterproof hydraulic cement. The plan includes dimensions of 36'-0" by 17'-0" with various internal dimensions. The section detail shows a slope grade away of 2% and specifies cleaning and roughening the bedrock surface with a bonding agent applied. The drawing scale is 1/8"=1'-0".

images.summary: This section view illustrates a slab-on-grade foundation with detailed construction specifications. It includes (2) 15M continuous rebar for reinforcement, with compacted granular fill 'A' beneath the slab and bedrock as the base layer. A foam construction gasket is provided between new and existing concrete. The section also details a pier pinned to bedrock with (4) 12-inch long 15M rebar dowels. The slope grade is specified to be away at 2%. The joint between rock and concrete slab is to be grouted with waterproof hydraulic cement. The bedrock surface must be cleaned and roughened, with a bonding agent applied. The section is labeled as 2/S1, indicating its reference on sheet S1. The dimensions include a minimum thickness of 6 inches, a 1-foot width, and an 11-inch height for the thickened edge. The drawing scale is 1/2"=1'-0".
